Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
finalize \finalize\ v. t. [imp. & p. p. {finalized}; p. pr. & vb. n. {finalizing}.] to put the last touches on; put into final form.
Syn: make final, settle, nail down. [WordNet 1.5]
finalize v : make final; put the last touches on; put into final form; "let's finalize the proposal" [syn: {finalise}, {settle}, {nail down}]
